generated.title: Build Generated Successfully
generated.note_windows: Note: You might need to disable SmartScreen or adjust Windows security settings.
generated.note_macos: Note: For macOS, you may need to adjust security settings to run the application.
generated.note_linux: Note: Ensure you have the necessary dependencies installed.
generated.note_android: Note: You may need to enable "Unknown Sources" in device settings.

generator.title: RustDesk Custom Client Builder
generator.fixDelay: Fix connection delay when using third-party API
generator.configName: Name of the configuration (no spaces or special characters, English characters only):
generator.appName: Custom Application Name (leave blank to use default):
generator.downloadLink: Custom URL for downloading updates (replaces https://rustdesk.com/download):
generator.compName: Company name for copyright (replaces Purslane Ltd):
generator.passwordHelp: *The password is used as default, but can be changed by the client
generator.autoClose: Automatically close incoming sessions on user inactivity
generator.hidecm: Allow hiding the connection window from remote screen.
generator.themeHelp: *Default sets the theme but allows the client to change it, Override sets the theme permanently.
generator.permHelp: The following Permissions can be set as default (the user can change the settings) or override (the settings cannot be changed).
generator.cycleMonitor: Add a button to cycle through available monitors to the minimized toolbar.
generator.xOffline: Display an X for offline devices in the addressbook.

waiting.title: Generating Build
waiting.status_text: This can take 20-30 minutes (or longer if there are other users).
waiting.macos_note: Note for macOS users: Generating an executable may require additional steps or permissions.
